Key Match Events: South Africa won by 3 wickets (with 5 balls remaining) (DLS method)
Alzarri Joseph took a series-winning 5 for 40 in the last T20I against South Africa before the World Cup
Pre-Game Insights: West Indies and South Africa face off in a virtual quarter-final at T20 World Cup
Winner goes through to the final four, loser goes out
Bishop: WI batters have to play freely against South Africa
West Indies and South Africa both unbeaten through the group stage
West Indies lost to defending champions England in the Super Eight
West Indies swept South Africa 3-0 before the tournament
West Indies WLWWW (last five matches, most recent first)
Alzarri Joseph has taken a wicket once every 11 balls at the tournament
Joseph dismissed Quinton de Kock, Reeza Hendricks, David Miller and Heinrich Klaasen in the last T20I against South Africa
Marco Jansen has an economy rate of 5.90 and has been match-winning in other ways
Shai Hope's unbeaten 39-ball 82 against USA may mean West Indies do not have immediate cause to bring in Kyle Mayers
South Africa may consider playing two spinners again in Antigua
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain may be a concern for the match with a forecast of 17% precipitation probability in the evening
The head-to-head record between West Indies and South Africa is equal: Played 22; West Indies won 11; South Africa won 11
West Indies scored the highest total of the tournament with their 218 against Afghanistan in the group stage
Nicholas Pooran is the tournament's top run-scorer with 227 runs; Quinton de Kock is in third place, 40 runs behind
